original_text: The king got up in a rage, left his wine and went out into the palace garden. But Haman, realizing that the king had already decided his fate, stayed behind to beg Queen Esther for his life.
korean_text: 왕이 노하여 일어나서 잔치 자리를 떠나 왕궁 후원으로 들어가니라 하만이 일어서서 왕후 에스더에게 생명을 구하니 이는 왕이 자기에게 벌을 내리기로 결심한 줄 앎이더라

sentences.original_text: The king got up in a rage
and went out into the palace garden
realizing that the king had already decided his fate
sentences.korean_translation: 왕이 이미 그의 운명을 결정했다는 것을 깨닫고

sentences.original_text: stayed behind to beg Queen Esther for his life
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 목숨을 구걸하기 위해 에스더 왕후에게 남아있었다
